title: A Very Merry Iconic Podcast - LET IT SNOW (Netflix)

itunes:subtitle: Throughout November and December, Danny and co-host Jenna Brister will be recapping holiday movies in the spinoff podcast, A Very Merry Iconic Podcast. This week they dive into LET IT SNOW, a Netflix original. Danny will be back later this week with a ...
description:
Throughout November and December, Danny and co-host Jenna Brister will be recapping holiday movies in the spinoff podcast, A Very Merry Iconic Podcast. This week they dive into LET IT SNOW, a Netflix original. Danny will be back later this week with a Housewives recap, but for now we hope you enjoy this holiday preview.


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic

LINKS:
